summary:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Only 3.75 Crore Away From The Biggest Milestone

Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 Hindi has witnessed another strong day at the box office, reaching an estimated total of 796.25 crore in 28 days. The film is only 3.75 crore away from hitting the 800 crore mark, a significant milestone in Hindi Cinema.

  • On Day 28, the film earned between 3.5 to 4 crore.
  • Despite a drop from the New Year’s collection of 10 crore, it stays on track for more records.
  • Week-wise earnings show a robust performance, with a total of 796.25 crore estimated.
  • The film is witnessing the biggest fourth-week box office collection at an estimated 56 crore, 48% higher than the previous record.
“The fourth week of Pushpa 2 has finally ended at an estimated 56 crore at the box office.”

Overall, Pushpa 2 continues to perform exceptionally well, maintaining strong attendance rates and inching ever closer to record-breaking achievements in Hindi cinema.

The ambitious horror-comedy cinematic universe from Maddock Films is set to launch in 2025 with the release of Thama featuring Ayushmann Khurrana as a vampire, followed by a lineup of interconnected films.

  • The universe kicks off in 2025 with Thama, releasing during the Diwali holiday.
  • Shakti Shalini will follow on December 31, 2025.
  • Bhediya 2 and Chamunda will be released in 2026.

title: Keerthy Suresh recalls father’s reaction to Christian wedding ceremony: ‘I never thought he would say…’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Keerthy Suresh recalls father’s reaction to Christian wedding ceremony: ‘I never thought he would say…’

Publication Date: December 2023
Source: Indian Express

Actor Keerthy Suresh tied the knot with her longtime boyfriend, Antony Thattil, in a traditional ceremony followed by a white wedding. She shared her emotional journey, her father’s supportive role in her wedding, and reflections on their long-distance relationship.

  • Keerthy and Antony had been in a long-distance relationship for 5-6 years.
  • Her father participated in the Christian wedding ceremony, surprising her with his willingness to walk her down the aisle.
  • Keerthy reflected on her father's support and how she sees his qualities in Antony.
  • The couple’s weddings took place in Goa, first in a South Indian style and then Christian style shortly after.
“Dads are supposed to walk the bride down the aisle, will you do that for me? He replied, ‘Ya, why not?... I never thought he would say ok to it and I am really happy he did that for me.”

In conclusion, Keerthy Suresh’s wedding journey highlighted the importance of family support and the blending of traditions during significant life events.
newTitle: Keerthy Suresh Shares Heartfelt Moments from Her Wedding

title: Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya - Hindustan Times
summary:
Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Hindustan Times

Sivasri Skandaprasad, a noted classical singer recognized for her work in 'Ponniyin Selvan', has attracted attention due to her rumored engagement with BJP leader Tejasvi Surya, although neither party has confirmed the news.

  • Sivasri, born on August 1, 1996, is the daughter of Mridangam maestro Seerkazhi Sri J Skandaprasad.
  • She is both a Carnatic singer and a performing Bharatanatyam artist with multiple accolades.
  • Sivasri is a bio-engineering graduate and has a diploma in Ayurvedic cosmetology.
  • She is the founder of 'Ahuti', a platform aimed at promoting Indian art forms and inclusive education.
  • Her contribution to Carnatic music includes performances in prestigious venues and accompanied notable Bharatanatyam dancers.
  • Awarded several titles, including 'Bharata Kala Choodamani' for her significant contributions to the arts.
  • Gained recognition after Prime Minister Modi praised her rendition of a Kannada Ram bhajan.
“Dear Modi ji, Thank you so much. This is really big for a humble artiste like me. Thank you for encouraging us to constantly strive towards serving Bharat and continue our spiritual journey.”

With her multifaceted talents and contributions, Sivasri Skandaprasad continues to inspire many in the realm of Indian classical arts.
newTitle: Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya

title: Justin Baldoni's former agency refutes dropping him under Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds' pressure - Hindustan Times
summary:
WME claims it did not drop Justin Baldoni due to Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively accused him of harassment.

January 02, 2025, Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni’s former agency, WME, insisted that they did not drop the actor and director because of Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively filed a lawsuit accusing Baldoni of sexual harassment.

  • WME states no pressure came from Lively or Reynolds when Baldoni was dropped.
  • Baldoni filed a $250 million lawsuit against The New York Times following coverage of Lively's complaint.
  • The lawsuit alleges Lively sabotaged Baldoni's role and participation in a film premiere.
  • Lively's attorney claims the lawsuit has no bearing on existing allegations against Baldoni.
WME: "This is not true. Baldoni’s former representative was not at the Deadpool & Wolverine premiere nor was there any pressure from Reynolds or Lively to drop Baldoni as a client."

The unfolding legal battle highlights ongoing tensions between the actors, as Baldoni seeks to clear his name amidst serious allegations.
newTitle: WME Denies Dropping Justin Baldoni Under Pressure from Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds

title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 29: Can Allu Arjun movie cross ₹2,000 crore mark with THIS collection on Jan 2 | Today News - Mint
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 29: Can Allu Arjun movie cross ₹2,000 crore mark with THIS collection on Jan 2

Publication Date: January 2, 2023   Source: Live Mint

Pushpa 2 continues to perform impressively at the box office, nearing its one-month mark with significant collections.

  • The movie collected ₹2.69 crore net on Day 29, bringing its total domestic earnings to ₹1187.44 crore.
  • Worldwide gross stands at ₹1679 crore, with ₹266.25 crore from overseas and ₹1412.75 crore from the domestic market.
  • The film achieved the fastest crossing of the ₹1,700 crore mark within 25 days.
  • It is a major hit in the Hindi market, grossing ₹9.5 crore net from its Hindi version on the same day.
“Pushpa 2 is now the second highest grosser of Indian cinema after Dangal.”

Despite competition from new releases, Pushpa 2 maintains strong box office performance, along with a star-studded cast and extensive runtime.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 29: Can Allu Arjun movie cross ₹2,000 crore mark with THIS collection on Jan 2
